question: You are currently taking a course at a college but you will need to have a week off during this course.Write a letter to the college Principal. In the letter•	give details of your course •	explain why you need a week off •	say what you want the Principal to do
text: My name is Syed Ishaq and I am one of your college student. I am currently studying Computer science in my first year. The purpose of writing this letter to request you for a week off during this course.

My sister is getting married on 25th August this month and my family is expecting me to attend this function in my home town Hyderabad, India. As this event is so important for me, I can't miss this occasion. I have already spoken with my class in charge Mr Smith for the backup for all the lectures that I am going to miss during this week off.
I expect you to approve my leave request from 23rd August to 29th August. I will be in regular touch with my classmate John to get all regular updates about my course.

error_list.error_des: The singular countable noun student follows the quantifier one of, which requires a plural noun. Consider using a plural noun or a different quantifier.
It seems that you are missing a verb. Consider adding it.
